page.title: 18Employment.
page.content: A large number of people who live in Oxted actually {work }in the centre of {London,}Britain's Capital City, which is less than an hour away by rail. Some work in towns not so far away, such as{Croydon}or{Bromley, }& some of course work in the Oxted area itself. {Many people travel into Oxted}to work, often because House prices are very high here. For example, the teachers in our Middle School travel by car {from as far away as Crawley , Epsom , {Kenley, & Swanley. Employment opportunities{within Oxted include: shop assistants, bank clerks, teachers, doctors, nurses, bar staff, garage mechanics & telephonists. In the area{around Oxted}there are several farms , 2 sewage treatment works, an oil well, a golf course, a sand pit & a mushroom farm, all of which provide some work.
